About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

SunGard - System Access

System Analyst

As a Systems Analyst, I am part of a team that implements 'Symbols' Core Banking application to retail banks around the world. I specialize in Retail Banking/Deposits implementing solutions requested by the customers from project initiation to Go Live implementation. I contributed to the team as a full stack developer (Oracle Forms, Reports, PL/SQL), Technical Business Analysts, Consultant, and Operations Support capabilities.

Macquarie Offshore Services Pty Ltd - Philippines Branch

Team Lead - Database Developer

As a Team Lead, I managed a team that is focused on ensuring the business has a stable technology platform that enables them to deliver and meet various regulatory requirements.

Macquarie Group - Australia

Platform Owner

My main role is to manage the Technology Platform, ensure compliance, and allow the team to deliver changes that enables the business.
